oai_dc:dc.dc:title: THE GLOBAL VALUE CHAINS OF ORGANIC PINEAPPLES FROM UGANDA: A DESCRIPTION
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Norman, Kwikiriza
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Consumer issues
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper discusses the organic pineapple value chains of organic pineapples from Uganda, one of the developing countries in Africa. It includes the diagrammatic representation of the chain and points out key area where action is required for upgrading the chain. It points the fact that although the organic sector is young, it has a huge potential for benefiting the actors in it because of the growing market for organically produced products.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Norman, Kwikiriza (2014) THE GLOBAL VALUE CHAINS OF ORGANIC PINEAPPLES FROM UGANDA: A DESCRIPTION. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
